articles.description: Apple has implemented its Neural Text-to-Speech (Neural TTS) technology to create Siri voices by natural sound. Apple has produced two new Siri voices through i
articles.content: The iPhone maker, Apple Inc., has made various improvements and unique products in the past years. Siri, its speech assistant application, has evolved to be extra natural and effective over the years… [+3023 chars]
